channel.title: DigitalOcean, Micropost on Summitt Dweller's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DigitalOcean, Micropost on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: matomo-notes
item.description: Last weekend Mackenzie and I created a new Matomo analytics server on a DigitalOcean droplet w/ 2G of RAM. The story of its development and maintenance is being told in Matomo Installation Notes and its dashboard is available at https://analytics.summittservices.com. -/-/-/ location: Toledo, IA
